entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:13 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -1.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
